forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 21C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 68F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 67F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
